title: Font in the making /
content:
Hello everyone,

I've been working on this font for over a year now, I've been putting it on and off and I'm hoping to finish it by the end of the year. Right now all I have is lowercase and will eventually work my way to numbers and glyphs.

I'll gladly appreciate any feedback and criticism.  
Thanks

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317175554im_/http:/christians.siteground.net/portfolio/typeface.png)
author: solorzano

comments.content: I wonder, what are the thoughts behind having different coloration for the letters?
I really like this! The one letter that doesn't seem to work is the k---why do you have an ascender so high for the upper right arm?
I liked it, but the x seems to belong to a different typeface.
Thanks for the feedback. I'll post an updated version later.
Yeah, I agree. I can't really seem to find a solution to make it fit more with the rest. Any suggestions?
